import React from "react"; import { useCart } from "../../context/CartContext"; import RatingBar from "./RatingBar"; const ProductCard = ({ _id, name, desc, images, categoryName, brand, ratings, price, discount, badge, inStock = true, }) => { const { cart, setCart, addToCart, removeFromCart, clearCart } = useCart(); return (
{!inStock &&

Out Of Stock

}
{badge != "" && (
{badge}
)}
{name}

{desc}

Price

₹ {price} ₹{(price - price * (discount / 100)).toFixed(0)}

{ratings}

); }; export default ProductCard;
